name: todo_app_monorepo
description: Todo app with GatsbyJS frontend and Express + Knex + Objection + PostgreSQL backend

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && pnpm dev" "cd frontend && pnpm dev"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd server && pnpm build" "cd frontend && pnpm build"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd server && pnpm start" "cd frontend && pnpm serve"

author: Massick
